airTemperatureMsg

func:
var data = msg.payload["deviceInfo"]
var decode = msg.payload["object"]
    if (decode["Work_mode"]=="Interrupt Sensor send"){
    var f_port = msg.payload["fPort"]
    var f_cnt = msg.payload["fCnt"]
    var data2 = decode
    var bat =data2["BatV"]
    var bat_status=data2["Bat_status"]
    var work_mode=data2["Work_mode"]
    var exti_pin_level=data2["Exti_pin_level"]
    var exti_status=data2["Exti_status"]
    var hum_SHT=data2["Hum_SHT"]
    var tempC_SHT=data2["TempC_SHT"]
    var a1={payload:f_port},a2={payload:f_cnt},a3={payload:bat},a4={payload:bat_status},a5={payload:work_mode},
    a6={payload:exti_pin_level},a7={payload:exti_status},a8={payload:hum_SHT},a9={payload:tempC_SHT}
    return [a1,a2,a3,a4,a5,a6,a7,a8,a9];
}
